mapper.sql: select dmn.id, dmn.user_id, dmn.title, dmn.content, dmn.status as statusCode, s.description as statusName, dmn.create_dt, dmn.update_dt from todo_domain dmn inner join todo_status s on dmn.status = s.id where dmn.is_del = 0
mapper.insert: insert into todo_domain(user_id, title, content, status) values (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{statusCode})
mapper.update: update todo_domain SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, status = #{statusCode}, update_dt = now() WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.delete: update todo_domain SET is_del = 1, delete_dt = now() WHERE id = #{id}
update todo_item SET is_del = 1, delete_dt = now() WHERE domain_id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, description, icon FROM todo_status
